General.Name: KWESST Micro Systems Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: KWESST Micro Systems Inc. engages in the development and commercialization of tactical systems and ammunitions for military, public safety agencies, and personal defense markets. The company offers less-lethal products, including PARA OPS devices and ARWEN products; battlefield laser defense system and phantom electronic warfare device; and digitization products and services. KWESST Micro Systems Inc. was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Ottawa, Canada.
General.Address: 155 Terence Matthews Crescent, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K2M 2A8

1.Name: Mr. Sean  Homuth B.Comm., C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
1.Title: President, CEO & Director
